altername_name: Running Naked in a Field of Flowers
name: RNFF
overview: J-War is on a holiday with field and flowers all around. Naturally, madness ensues. Move J-War around the field where you can find several pills and/or mushrooms. Collect them all to finish the level. But beware, mushrooms will make you walk slower! However, you will also be able to jump much higher. You may need them to get to those hard to reach places.
